name: TakeCare (M4nt0s)
description:
TakeCare is a game in which you have to successfully master 3 mini-games and achieve the highest possible number of points. Most of the mini-games are clicker and a bit plattformer.

- Firsts Game Jam ever

- Game not 100% finished

- Not 100% bug free

Have fun and if you want post your score in the comments :)
